imdb.plot outline: Meng Nan is a member of a mysterious human research institution and was sent to China to find a very special patient. Soon he found that all the clues were pointing to a remote Sansui sanatorium. Meng Nan became an intern at the sanatorium just to realise the doctors are hiding a lot of secrets.
imdb.title: Madhouse: The Classification of Spirit
plot: Meng Nan is a member of a mysterious human research institution and was sent to China to find a very special patient. Soon he found that all the clues were pointing to a remote Sansui sanatorium. Meng Nan became an intern at the sanatorium just to realise the doctors are hiding a lot of secrets.::AA
